resources.string:
Hi, Welcome to the Rubix Cube Assistant app. 
An app designed to help you achieve faster times when solving the Rubix Cube, we aim to provide as much tips and guidance to ensure you (the user) has the best experience. 

We have included many features in our app that we hope you will enjoy! 

This includes the ability to use your phone's camera to scan your cube and represent a 3D model of the said cube.

The ability for the app to figure out the best solution to solving your cube 

Currently the app is in development and there will be more features added soon!

Thank you for reading through and we hope we satisfy your experience in using the app :D
"R2 F2 R2 D2 B' R2 F L2 D2 F D2 U' B2 R2 B' D2 U' L' U' "
Hold your cube such that the center colors match as follows, and input your cube\'s colors. When done with ALL SIX SIDES, hit \"Generate Solution.\"

1) Use the drop-up menu in the bottom-left to choose a color. 
2) Find the side of your cube with that center color. 
3) Align the grid with that side of the cube and take a picture of it (the camera will autofocus). 
4) Repeat steps 1-3 for the other five sides.


TIPS: 
	•		Take pictures in good lighting 
	•		Keep the lighting across pictures of all six side consistent 
	•		Try to avoid taking shaky pictures
